review: This is a great product and tool for casting just about anything and everything from your phone or your computer to your TV.You can stream everything from within the chrome browser.  Everything from youtube, to movies that you watch Right formLikewise, you can stream the same, if not more, from your phone.  You'll get better quality video streaming/casting from your phone because there's a lot more apps that are compatible.  This is because it's android and android has a lot more flexability and control with Android.As opposed to microsoft, there is a lot that you can do, but some advanced functionality is still in beta in windows.  There is a lot of stability with windows, it's just that they have an additional Casting Beta app that is seperate.  Which is actually kinda nice to be able to test out and work wit what's coming soon or what will be updated.However, to each their own.  I enjoy casting from both, but have more of a preference to the phone.  Probably because I'm not weighed so to speak by the laptop;  as the phone offers more flexibility.Regardless, I also like the FireStick as well.  I use the Fire Stick more than the Chrome cast.  Moreso because the Firestick doesn't require you to be bound to your phone or computer to use it.  And it comes with its own remote.  Everyone has their own preference though.
